definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">To avoid 'undead' entites.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="health"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MIN</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amplifier</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_health_max"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
